description: DeepSight Technology Inc. is actively searching for a GPU Software Engineer to apply to join our amazing medical imaging team full-time in our St. Louis, MO or Santa Clara, CA office!<p><br></p>We are an innovative medical imaging company that invests in our team and offers real opportunities for career growth. This GPU Software Engineer position works 2-3 days per week at one of our US offices in the St. Louis or San Francisco Bay areas and earns a <strong>competitive salary of $60,000-$166,000 a year, based on skills, experience, and office location.</strong> We provide top-notch benefits and perks, including health, vision, dental, stock options, and a 401(k)-retirement plan.<p><br></p><strong><u>About Deepsight Technology Inc.</u></strong><p><br></p>DeepSight Technology Inc. is a stealth mode startup company that has developed breakthrough technology in ultrasound imaging. We are setting new standards that will dramatically improve the capabilities of ultrasound for many years.<p><br></p>In order to develop and improve this technology, we need dedicated team players on our side. Being a team player, you enjoy working with our transducer, hardware, and systems teams as you work to optimize our system prototype and product designs. Position requires minimal overnight, domestic travel by plane, car, etc. Valid driver’s license required.<p><br></p><strong>Salary </strong><p><br></p>Commensurate with qualifications and experience. Minimum: $67,214.40.<p><br></p><strong><u>Benefits</u></strong><p><br></p>The ELCA offers a competitive benefits package for eligible employees, including employer paid health premiums for employees, health and dependent care FSA’s, a health savings account (HSA) with an employer contribution, life insurance, and a substantial employer contribution to 403b retirement plan (no match required).
